page.shortlink: api objects query object find first function
page.description: The .FIND_FIRST() method returns a pointer to the first key value.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "" qry = tbl.query_create() ? qry.find_first() = Key = "11111-01" Record = 1
